601: Operations Specialist - Global New Issuance Desk Role Purpose This role will be responsible for performing operational tasks throughout the rating process. This includes creating, managing and processing ratings related data, liaising and providing support to analysts, ensuring compliance of processes & KPI’s in accordance with policies and procedures. Quality, accuracy and timeliness of the ratings information and its dissemination to the marketplace are critical within this role. Location : Centennial, CO Business Impact A visible role with global impact and coverage across the Ratings practice while working with the broader data, technology and operations community. This role works closely with Commercial, Technology and Data teams to connect transformation initiatives with analytical and other end users. The role also works with analytical staff and leadership to ensure a high level of operational efficiency, problem solving, and innovation. Key Responsibilities Performs operational tasks such as setting up workflow system jobs, managing interactions with team, and performing documentation checks. Extracts data from internal and external documentation and accurately enters data and content into required systems, ensuring accuracy and completeness in accordance with pre-defined targets. Validates ratings information in systems and publications prior to rating release. Under supervision, performs tasks in support of the process for ancillary services. These tasks include: ensuring appropriate commercial documentation has been received, initiating and closing workflow jobs, and performing quality checks to ensure compliance. Supports ongoing records management activities and information gathering for audits / reviews as required. Background & Experience: Minimum 1 year professional experience College degree required. Strong interpersonal, written, and verbal communication skills and a customer-service orientation. Ability to work in a fast-paced, high pressure, fluid environment while performing multiple tasks and ensuring high quality, error free output. Must be confident, calm under pressure and possess influencing skills. Must be able to work effectively in a team-oriented, global, and multi-cultural environment. Strong technical skills with Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Acrobat.
